value.title: Conditional Column in Power BI using Power Query   You can do anything
value.excerpt: There are many scenarios that you might want to implement a conditional expression. value.title: Power BI Design Tip   Design for Mobile Device
value.excerpt: Power BI is a mobile-friendly reporting solution. Every report that you generate can be viewed on the Mobile too. value.excerpt: Power BI reports are highly interactive, If you select a column in a column chart other charts will be highlighted.
